name: Geimu's Grand Gensokyo Galavant
description:
A 2d platformer bullet hell where you play as Reimu to try and rescue your girlfriend Sanae from the mischievous fairy Clownpiece. Our first game.

Programmers: github.com/gabman15 , github.com/regenerativep

Artist:  https://codsorbet.itch.io/

Credits to Team Shanghai Alice and Zun for Creating Touhou Project

Enjoy!
